sentences.sentence: A good teacher encourages independence of thought.
sentences.translation: 好的教师鼓励独立思考。

sentences.sentence: The company encourages job-shares and part-time working.
sentences.translation: 这家公司鼓励工作分担和从事兼职工作。

sentences.sentence: When things aren't going well, he encourages me, telling me not to give up.
sentences.translation: 当事情不顺利的时候，他鼓励我，告诉我不要放弃。
